Text:
Big Brother should have clearly defined "strategic nomination" for them - maybe even giving them criterea. Big Brother attempted this actually - telling them criterea like "flying under the radar", "playing all house mates, being on good terms with everyone", "being a strong physical/mental competitor" - people like Josh/Michael/Benjamin/Zoe. The people in the house are so dumbďťż that 90% of them still nominated for personal reasons. Ridiculous, RIDICULOUS !
